response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its immense value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for high-quality solutions. I trust this price will be attractive enough to consider the opportunity. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this exceptional product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
